languages.text: "Знайте, чада — истина высечена золотом на пергаменте души, а ложь и ересь — отрава, сей пергамент разъедающая".
"Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."
languages.original_text: "Знайте, чада — истина высечена золотом на пергаменте души, а ложь и ересь — отрава, сей пергамент разъедающая".

traits.locale_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."
"Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."
"Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."
"Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."
"Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

languages.text: “别忘了，我的孩子们。真理用黄金刻在灵魂的羊皮纸上，而谎言与异端邪说则是侵蚀这张羊皮纸的毒药。”
languages.original_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

traits.locale_text: “别忘了，我的孩子们。真理用黄金刻在灵魂的羊皮纸上，而谎言与异端邪说则是侵蚀这张羊皮纸的毒药。”

languages.text: «Habéis de saber, hijos míos, que la verdad se encuentra en el velo protector del alma tallada en oro, mientras que las falacias y las herejías son el veneno que amenazan con romper dicho velo».
languages.original_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

traits.locale_text: «Habéis de saber, hijos míos, que la verdad se encuentra en el velo protector del alma tallada en oro, mientras que las falacias y las herejías son el veneno que amenazan con romper dicho velo».

languages.text: 「我が子供たちよ、真実は魂の羊皮紙に金で刻まれ、嘘と異端はこの羊皮紙を侵食しようとする毒であることを知りなさい」
languages.original_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

traits.locale_text: 「我が子供たちよ、真実は魂の羊皮紙に金で刻まれ、嘘と異端はこの羊皮紙を侵食しようとする毒であることを知りなさい」

languages.text: "Wisset, meine Kinder, dass die Wahrheit in Gold auf dem Pergament der Seele geschrieben steht, wohingegen Lügen und Ketzerei das Gift sind, das dieses Pergament aufzulösen droht."
languages.original_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

traits.locale_text: "Wisset, meine Kinder, dass die Wahrheit in Gold auf dem Pergament der Seele geschrieben steht, wohingegen Lügen und Ketzerei das Gift sind, das dieses Pergament aufzulösen droht."

languages.text: « Sachez, mes enfants, que la vérité est tracée à l'or sur le parchemin de l'âme, tandis que les mensonges et l'hérésie sont le poison qui menace l'intégrité-même de ce parchemin. »
languages.original_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

traits.locale_text: « Sachez, mes enfants, que la vérité est tracée à l'or sur le parchemin de l'âme, tandis que les mensonges et l'hérésie sont le poison qui menace l'intégrité-même de ce parchemin. »

languages.text: "Çocuklarım, unutmayın! Gerçek, ruh dediğimiz parşömene altın harflerle kazınmıştır. Yalanlar ve kâfirlikler de bu parşömene zarar vermeye çalışan birer zehirdir."
languages.original_text: "Know, my children, that the truth is carved in gold into the parchment of the soul, while lies and heresy are the poison that threatens to erode this parchment."

traits.locale_text: "Çocuklarım! Unutmayın! Gerçek, ruh dediğimiz parşömene altın harflerle kazınmıştır, içindeki yalanlar ve kâfirlikler bu parşömene zarar vermeye çalışan birer zehirdir."
